mapper.select: select * from menu where mCode like '%'||'0000'||'%' and isnav=1 and available='1' order by mOrder asc
select * from menu where upCode = #{mCode} and isNav=1 and available='1' order by mOrder asc

select subj_name as lec_name, p.name,p.email_addr ,lo.lec_cd,syl.lec_date_1,syl.lec_date_2,syl.classroom ,lec_open_status_cd from lec_open lo,syllabus syl,lec_manage lm,prof p where lo.lec_cd = syl.syl_cd and syl.subj_cd = lm.subj_cd and p.prof_cd = syl.prof_id and prof_id = #{prod_cd} and lec_open_status_cd='open' order by lec_open_status_cd desc
select syl_cd as lec_cd,subj_name as lec_name from lec a, syllabus b, lec_manage c where a.lec_cd=b.syl_cd and b.subj_cd=c.subj_cd and stu_cd =#{stuCd} and seme_cd=#{semeCd} and MYLEC_STATUS_CD='s'
